fields.name: Landscape
fields.description: Capture a broad view of nature, like mountains, a serene meadow, or a coastal beach, emphasizing depth and scenery.

fields.name: Portrait
fields.description: Focus on the essence of a human face or bust, with key features like eyes, nose, and mouth sketched quickly.

fields.name: Still Life
fields.description: Draw inanimate objects, such as a fruit bowl, a vase of flowers, or an arrangement of everyday items, emphasizing shape and shadow.

fields.name: Animal Study
fields.description: Sketch a simplified form of an animal, focusing on basic structure and key characteristics, like the curve of a catâ€™s back or a bird's beak.

fields.name: Urban Scene
fields.description: Depict a street view, with buildings, streetlights, and people moving about, capturing the energy of a city with minimal detail.

fields.name: Seascape
fields.description: Illustrate the ocean with waves, a sandy shore, or a boat floating on the water, focusing on the fluidity of the scene.
